items.value:
- Two fingers to move the board
- Pinch to zoom
items.label: With a touchpad

items.value:
- Left click on the board to move the board
- Wheel to zoom
items.label: With a mouse

items.value:
- When an item is selected, click on the action icon inside the action menu just above the item
- You can double click on an item to trigger his main action
- You also can use the keyboard shortcuts shown when you hover an action in the menu
items.label: A single item

items.value:
- Click to select a card just above
- Double click to flip it
- Try another action of the menu
- Try to do action with keyboard shortcuts
- Select all cards and try the new actions
items.label: Let's try it

items.value:
- Two fingers to move the board
- Pinch to zoom
items.label: With a toushscreen

items.value:
- The last icon is not an action but toggle the edit panel
- You can edit every aspect of this item this way
- You shouldn't need it while playing but can be useful sometimes
items.label: Item edition

items.value:
- You can start to select multiple items by clicking outside of any item with the left button and moving the mouse.
- Then you can move all items
items.label: Multiple items

items.value:
- You can drag and drop item by clicking on any unlocked item.
- You can select one item by clicking on it
- you can clear the selection by clicking outside an item
items.label: A single item

items.value:
- Try to move the meeples on the right
- Try to select them all
- Try to move them all at the same time
items.label: Let's try it

items.value:
- Use the action menu for the selected items, only actions available for all items are displayed
- You may have noticed that some actions are only visible when you've selected multiple items like, the shuffle action
- You can also use keyboard shortcuts here
items.label: Multiple items

board.defaultBaseline: Learn how to play with Airboardgame
board.defaultDescription:
# Demo game

This is a demo game to learn how to play with Airboardgame.

For other games, you can find useful information about the game like the creator name or the rules.

translations.name: Comment jouer ?
translations.description:
# Démonstration

Ce jeu vous permet d'apprendre à jouer avec Airboardgame.

Pour les autres jeux, vous trouverez dans cette section différentes choses utiles comme le nom de l'auteur ou les règles.
